name: teamwork-create-task
description: Create a new task in the backlog. [See the docs here](https://apidocs.teamwork.com/docs/teamwork/cd8948166b1b1-create-a-task)

creatorId.description: The id of the person who created the task

responsiblePartyId.description: The id of the person who is responsible for the task

name: teamwork-create-user
description: Create a new user in Teamwork. [See the docs here](https://apidocs.teamwork.com/docs/teamwork/v1/people/post-people-json)

emailAddress.description: The email address of the person

firstName.description: The first name of the person

lastName.description: The last name of the person

sendInvite.description: Whether to send an invitation email to the new user

title.description: The job title of the person

phoneNumberOffice.description: The office phone number of the person

phoneNumberOfficeExt.description: The office phone extension of the person

phoneNumberMobileCountrycode.description: The country code for the mobile phone number

phoneNumberMobilePrefix.description: The prefix for the mobile phone number

phoneNumberMobile.description: The mobile phone number of the person

phoneNumberHome.description: The home phone number of the person

phoneNumberFax.description: The fax number of the person

address.description: Object containing address information. [See the documentation](https://apidocs.teamwork.com/docs/teamwork/v1/people/post-people-json) for more information.

profile.description: The profile information of the person

userTwitterName.description: The Twitter handle of the person

userLinkedin.description: The LinkedIn profile URL of the person

userFacebook.description: The Facebook profile URL of the person

userWebsite.description: The personal website of the person

imService.description: The instant messaging service used by the person

imHandle.description: The instant messaging username of the person

language.description: The language preference for the person

dateFormatId.description: The date format ID for the person

timeFormatId.description: The time format ID for the person

timezoneId.description: The timezone ID for the person

calendarStartsOnSunday.description: Whether the calendar starts on Sunday

lengthOfDay.description: The length of day in hours

workingHours.description: Object containing working hours information. . [See the documentation](https://apidocs.teamwork.com/docs/teamwork/v1/people/post-people-json) for more information.

administrator.description: Whether the person is an administrator

canAddProjects.description: Whether the person can add projects

canManagePeople.description: Whether the person can manage people

autoGiveProjectAccess.description: Whether to automatically give the person access to new projects

canAccessCalendar.description: Whether the person can access the calendar

canAccessTemplates.description: Whether the person can access templates

canAccessPortfolio.description: Whether the person can access the portfolio

canManageCustomFields.description: Whether the person can manage custom fields

canManagePortfolio.description: Whether the person can manage the portfolio

canManageProjectTemplates.description: Whether the person can manage project templates

canViewProjectTemplates.description: Whether the person can view project templates

notifyOnTaskComplete.description: Whether to notify when tasks are completed

notifyOnAddedAsFollower.description: Whether to notify when added as a follower

notifyOnStatusUpdate.description: Whether to notify on status updates

userReceiveNotifyWarnings.description: Whether the user receives notification warnings

userReceiveMyNotificationsOnly.description: Whether the user receives only their own notifications

receiveDailyReports.description: Whether the person should receive daily reports

receiveDailyReportsAtWeekend.description: Whether to receive daily reports on weekends

receiveDailyReportsIfEmpty.description: Whether to receive daily reports even if empty

dailyReportSort.description: The sort order for daily reports

receiveDailyReportsAtTime.description: The time to receive daily reports

dailyReportEventsType.description: The type of events for daily reports

dailyReportDaysFilter.description: The days filter for daily reports

userType.description: The type of user (account, collaborator, contact)

getUserDetails.description: Whether to return user details in the response

name: teamwork-get-user
description: Get a user by ID. [See the documentation](https://apidocs.teamwork.com/docs/teamwork/v1/people/get-people-id-json)

peopleId.description: The ID of the user/person to get

name: teamwork-list-project-tasks
description: List tasks from a project. [See the docs here](https://apidocs.teamwork.com/docs/teamwork/6e3da2c04d779-get-all-tasks-on-a-given-project)

completeAfterDate.description: Only return tasks that are complete after this date. Format: YYYYMMDDHHMMSS

completeBeforeDate.description: Only return tasks that are complete before this date. Format: YYYYMMDDHHMMSS

creatorsId.description: Only return tasks that were created by these people.

maxResults.description: The maximum number of results to return

creatorId.description: The id of the person who created the task

responsiblePartyId.description: The id of the person who is responsible for the task

name: teamwork-update-user
description: Update a user in Teamwork. [See the documentation](https://apidocs.teamwork.com/docs/teamwork/v1/people/put-people-id-json)

peopleId.description: The ID of the user to update
